name: Might and Magic 9: Writ of Fate
name_original: Might and Magic 9: Writ of Fate
description:
Might and Magic 9: Writ of Fate is a RPG game developed by New World Computing. It came out on 01-04-2002. The 3DO Company published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Might and Magic 9: Writ of Fate on PC.
